segments.text: Can you read and write English and French ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm proficient in both written and spoken English , but I can only carry on a simple conversation in French .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you tell me something about your English education ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My mother is an English teacher in a college , so I began learning English when I could speak , and I took English as my minor subject at university .
segments.speaker: S2
